            "title": "Nan's Rejection and the Ghost Town Mystery",
            "starting_page": "1",
            "description": "A woman named Nan, dressed in a green hat and western attire, expresses her discontent with her current life in a 'Ghost Town'. She contrasts her dreams of glamour and romance with the harsh realities of her surroundings and the limited options available to her.  A man, Cal Patterson, approaches her, proposing they spend Sunday together. Nan firmly rejects him, citing her busy schedule and expressing her desire for more excitement than Ghost Town can offer.  She feels trapped by the town's mundane nature and longs for a life reminiscent of historical romantic figures and grand adventures, lamenting that fate has placed her in this situation a century too late. Another man, overhearing her, remarks on the persistence of women and points out that they are in a 'Ghost Town' which is not what she seems to believe.",
